title: Steal This Book Today! (stealthiswiki.org)
description:
This is "Steal this book today" which was compiled from the lovely users at stealthiswiki.org

Please seed it so that they dont have such a bandwidth burden!

I havnt gotten though all of it but theyve done a good job of keeping the spirit of Abbie Hoffman&#039;s Steal This Book alive.  They have added lots of new passages for the modern day radical.

You can also can go to their site and add stuff to this book.... if you can get through their registration system which unfortunately has horrible human verification codes that dont work... :(
